title: South Pacific Island Escape with Daily Breakfast & Discounted Volcano Safari
description: Experience the rugged natural beauty of Tanna, a small island in the South Pacific country of Vanuatu, with a stay at the White Grass Ocean Resort & Spa. This exotic dot in the ocean is home to Mount Yasur, one of the worldâ€™s most accessible volcanoes, making it a true bucket-list destination. Included in this authentic island getaway is a daily tropical breakfast, a delicious two-course dinner, bottle of sparkling wine and Vanuatu chocolates on arrival, return open-air airport transfers and more.

title: Serene Vanuatu Tanna Island Tropical Retreat near Mount Yasur with Tranquil Spa & Sparkling Pool
description: Transport yourself to an exotic dot in the South Pacific with a beachfront stay on Tanna Island, home to the awe-inspiring Mount Yasur volcano. Tucked away in Vanuatu, embrace the rugged beauty of the island while immersing yourself in the comforts of the boutique resort. Take a dip in the pool, stroll along the private beach and snorkel the crystal-clear waters, indulge in a pamper session at the spa or delight your tastebuds with local cuisine at the onsite restaurant
